sentences.en: "We've got the car that killed Myra Moss." — "What!"
sentences.cn: “我们已经找到撞死迈拉·莫斯的车了。”——“真的！”

sentences.en: Coughlan was killed in a car accident.
Dan got out of the car and locked the door.
Driving a boat is not the same as driving a car.
sentences.cn: 驾船和开车不是一回事。

sentences.en: He heard tires squeal as the car braked to avoid a collision.
sentences.cn: 为避免相撞而刹车时，他听到了轮胎与地面刺耳的摩擦声。

sentences.en: He isn’t old enough to drive a car.
sentences.cn: 他还未到可以开车的年龄。

sentences.en: He made his way into the dining car for breakfast.
He returned to the airport to find his car alarm going off.
sentences.cn: 他回到机场时听到自己的汽车报警器响了。

sentences.en: He slewed the car against the side of the building.
sentences.cn: 他的车滑到了大楼的一侧，抵住了。

sentences.en: If you build more plastics into cars, the car lasts longer.
sentences.cn: 如果汽车采用更多塑料元件，寿命会更长一些。

sentences.en: Mark was dragged from the burning wreckage of his car.
sentences.cn: 马克被人从他着火的汽车残骸中拉了出来。

sentences.en: Mr Martin was taken out of his car at gunpoint.
sentences.cn: 马丁先生被人用枪指着从车里带了出来。

sentences.en: Police investigating a £10 million car insurance fiddle arrested 16 people yesterday.
sentences.cn: 调查涉及1,000万英镑的汽车保险诈骗案的警察昨天逮捕了16人。

sentences.en: The car park was absolutely packed solid with people.
sentences.cn: 停车场被人挤得水泄不通。

sentences.en: The car passed over the body twice, once backward and then forward.
sentences.cn: 那辆车把那人来回轧了两次，先是倒着轧的，再是往前开着轧的。

sentences.en: The handles stand proud of the doors of the car.
The harder the brake pedal is pressed, the greater the car's deceleration.
sentences.cn: 刹车踩得越用力，车子减速越猛。

sentences.en: They broke free and made off in a stolen car.
sentences.cn: 他们挣脱后开着一辆偷来的车逃之夭夭。

sentences.en: They sat talking and necking in the car for another ten minutes.
sentences.cn: 他们在车里又坐了10分钟，边说边搂着亲热。

trans.tran_en: a vehicle with four wheels and an engine, that can carry a small number of passengers
a vehicle with four wheels and an engine, that can carry a small number of passengers
